short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert email signatures into gmail address book contacts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ContactSaver by CircleBack is unlike any other website in the world. ContactSaver searches your gmail inbox for contacts – so you don't have to.
No more copying and pasting email signatures from your personal or work Gmail, simply let this intelligent contact website comb your email and effortlessly save contact information into your address book. Plus, if you have Gmail connected to your iPhone, contacts you save with ContactSaver will automatically appear in your iPhone & Android contact list! 

Simply connect ContactSaver to your Gmail account to start uncovering email signatures buried in your inbox. ContactSaver will intelligently convert these email signatures into contacts and you decide whether to save a contact to your Gmail address book – or ignore it. That way your Gmail address book is always filled with the contacts you want.

In the event that ContactSaver uncovers a contact that already exists in your Gmail address book, only new information will be added – nothing will ever be deleted or changed. 

ContactSaver is secure, automatic, and makes your life easier. Get started now!
